::Zardus::

"The war is going well," Zardus replies, glancing questioningly at 
Squizzy. He looks at KitKat again. "Can you exuse us for a second? I 
have to speak with Squizzy."

He motions toward the door so that Squizzy and he could talk in the 
hallway.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::KitKat3::
> 
> She looked at Zardus as he entered the room.  She recalled he was a 
predacon 
> leader, but if he was on her side or not was beyond her recall of 
accounts.  
> She nodded to him. "Hello again. How's the war?"
